attributes.action: build a sense of community and reduce antisocial behaviour by replacing the system of paying housing benefit and council tax benefits direct to the landlord/council and replace it with a generalised increase in all benefits enabling recipients to take control of their housing costs and promote a sense of home ownership and community - as people ony feel they own what they pay for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently councils and the DSS pay housing costs on behalf of many people on ow incomes, however with these people not paying for their own accommodation they become disenfranchised and lose a sense of home and ownership.

This results in localised vandalism and no-go areas. if the government were to abolish all housing and council tax benefits in favour of a net overall increase in benefits to allow these people to pay their own accommodation costs.

This will enable people to take control over where they live and encourace a sense of community and stop antisocial behaviours
